contact_text: This blog doesn’t use comments, but I would still be delighted to hear your thoughts. You can email me tips, questions, concerns, or just say “hi.”
subscribe_intro: This site won't interrupt you with annoying popups asking for your email address or to send you notifications, and I don't regularly post on social media. If you want to stay up-to-date, then feel free to use these options below.
subscribe_feed_cta: Use this link to subscribe in your favorite newsreader. (What's this?)
subscribe_email_cta: Subscribe to receive updates in your email inbox. You will get a summary of new posts once per week.
